localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: LiveFlow (YC W21) is your first fully automated, NextGen Spreadsheet, that connects real-time data from your Google Sheets, banks, accounting and revenue platforms in a matter of seconds to fully flexible and customizable dashboards.
blogPost.body: LiveFlow (YC W21) is your first fully automated, NextGen Spreadsheet, that connects real-time data from your Google Sheets, banks, accounting and revenue platforms in a matter of seconds to fully flexible and customizable dashboards.
blogPost.title: LiveFlow - One hub to automate your finances
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一个完全自动化的下一代电子表格，它能在几秒钟内将来自Google Sheets、银行、会计和收入平台的实时数据连接到完全灵活和可定制的仪表盘。
localize.tagline: 一个让您的财务自动化的中心

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一個完全自動化的下一代電子表格，它能在幾秒鐘內將來自Google Sheets、銀行、會計和收入平臺的實時數據連接到完全靈活和可定製的儀表盤。
localize.tagline: 一個讓您的財務自動化的中心

previous.excerpt: Waving is a gamified social network, targeted for gen-z, we have the coolest features of other traditional social media but we added some sparks of gamification!!! Every action you make is converted to coins and you can change for new features and more range.
previous.title: Waving - Gamified social network

localize.description: 挥手是一个游戏化的社交网络，定位于gen-z，我们拥有其他传统社交媒体最酷的功能，但我们加入了一些游戏化的火花!!! 你的每一个动作都会被转换成金币，你可以换取新的功能和更多的范围。
揮手是一個遊戲化的社交網絡，定位於gen-z，我們擁有其他傳統社交媒體最酷的功能，但我們加入了一些遊戲化的火花!!! 你的每一個動作都會被轉換成金幣，你可以換取新的功能和更多的範圍。

localize.full_text:
有人联系过麦肯锡了吗 关于运河的事情？

可能会有一些真正的协同效应，他们还没有考虑到。

有人聯繫過麥肯錫了嗎 關於運河的事情？

可能會有一些真正的協同效應，他們還沒有考慮到。
